result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brent Michael Edwards

Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:03 AM Defendant Brent Michael Edwards in court.  Attorney Michael Charles Hoffman in court for Brent Michael Edwards.  Attorney Peter James Marvin Kruger in court for State of Wisconsin. State notes they are moving towards resolution, asks for another status. Attorney Hoffman is in agreement, State needs to consult victims.
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:07 AM Defendant Brent Michael Edwards in court.  Attorney Michael Charles Hoffman in court for Brent Michael Edwards.  Attorney Chad La lor in Court for Peter James Marvin Kruger in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Hoffman received information, waives reading and pleads not guilty. Asks for status in 45 days. Court accepts not guilty plea. State in agreement. Court sets status.
Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:18 AM Defendant Brent Michael Edwards in court.  Attorney Michael Charles Hoffman in court for Brent Michael Edwards.  Attorney Peter James Marvin Kruger in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney-Client waives preliminary hearing. Court finds waiver knowing/voluntary; finds probable cause that a felony was committed and binds over for arraignment. Court reminds of bail/conditions.
Arraignment scheduled for August 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
1:50 PM Prosecuting attorney Peter James Marvin Kruger in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brent Michael Edwards in court. Attorney Michael Charles Hoffman appeared by video for Brent Michael Edwards. Attorney Hoffman waives reading and asks for preliminary hearing. State requests $2,000 signature bond with condition to include no contact with W.H. Defendant does not have criminal history and appeared by summons today. Attorney Hoffman has no objection. Court orders $2,000 signature bond with condition of no contact with W.H.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 10:15 am.
